author: julianfoad
msg: Augment and update the Obliterate design docs.
New file, similar to fspec-cc1/cc1-file-ops.svg but showing the "delete
nodes" idea rather than the "combine changes" idea.
New presentation. An introduction to the reasons and requirements for
New document. A PDF version of why.odp, for convenience of viewing.

author: neels
msg: (close_file): Rearrange notification code. Don't bother setting NOTIFY's
LOCK_STATE in case of a tree-conflict notification.

author: hwright
msg: Don't bother fetching the UUID from a svn_wc_entry_t, just use the API instead.
(The UUID API just wraps a direct call into the libsvn_wc node info APIs.)
svn_client_merge_peg3): Don't conditionally get the uuid from an entry, just
try and fetch it using an API.

author: hwright
msg: Extend a node info fetching API to get the repos uuid, and rename it to a bit
more generic of a name.  Use this new API in a few places in libsvn_client.
(svn_wc__node_get_repos_info): ...this, and fetch the repos uuid as well
as the root.  Also, catch an additional error.
(info_error_handler): Update a caller to the above.
Don't get an entry just for the uuid, use the API instead!
